page.title: 14VILLAGE CRAFTS & TRADES
page.content: In appearance Oreton is a dispersed settlement with no visible centre but it is a close community. Its lifestyles are various and resourceful with many families pursuing several occupations and skills. Within the area one can have a refectory table made to order, animals transported to market, a cottage renovated and extended, car bodies and farm machinery repaired or a poodle dog clipped. The area abounds in farmers, nurserymen and beekeepers. There is a cameo glass artist, a working wheelwright's shop, a piano teacher and an horologist. A new handle can be fitted to a hoe or spade, tools sharpened, a picture painted or your hair cut. A resident band will play for dancing and there is a dance band caller. There is too a lace maker in the area.
